question: The purpose of PPE in the workplace is to:

answers.text: Eliminate the hazard by removing it completely
Protect the whole workforce by reducing the workplace risk
Provide protection from the residual risk when all other control measures have been considered

question: Which one of the following will protect your head against materials falling from a height?
Before using PPE, which of the following should you receive from your employer?
Which of these safety signs indicates the requirment to wear slip resistant shoes?
feedback: Safety signs may need some interpretation to decide what PPE is required.

question: Employers should provide PPE without first assessing the hazards and implementing other control processes.
